nodes.text: A wokling was a baby or infant Ewok. They were fawned over by their parents and were described as adorable by most people who met them. The term "wokling" is derived from the words "Ewok" and "youngling"[source?] (a term used by most species in the galaxy to describe their offspring). Woklings would become Ewoks in a ceremony known as "The Festival of Hoods".

The term "wokling" is used somewhat inconsistently. Sometimes it refers to only the youngest Ewoks, those who have not yet received their hoods. Other times, it is applied to Ewok children of any age. Also, some sources capitalize the term, while others do not.
